title: Is it advisable to write my college essay on how I fought depression? - Quora

response.answer_text: A personal experience always makes a great essay, as it goes the depth of your feelings. It also in a way reassures your strength to fight back your problems. The subject will also help similar souls fightIng with depression get some clarity and solution. When you write the essay, make sure you explain the situations and thoughts that put you through depression and also give them a way out of it. If you are only talking about the impact it created on you and not a solution, it would only make the readers situation worse. They would only be able to relate to it but not get out of it. So conclude with your best practises that helped you get through the depression and made you a strong person who is even willing to write about it. Good Luck and may I add, you are really a strong person.
